secText:
Lesson:
1. Define and calculate the [OBJ:expsec_p363:capacitance] of parallel-plate capacitors.
2. [OBJ:actsec_p400:Experiment] with parallel-plate capacitors.
3. Calculate the capacitance for capacitors in [OBJ:expsec_p42220:series and parallel].

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_38621:Calculate] the equivalent capacitance for capacitors in series.
2. [OBJ:qc_38622:Calculate] the equivalent capacitance for capacitors in parallel.
